creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: white tent at R with light shining toward a shadow of the Sphinx, from the front; small group gathered around embers of a campfire at center; animal in shadows at LRC
medium: Etching and drypoint, with chine appliqué
provenance: Collection of artist; given by artist to Charles Symonds. John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015.
signed: titled, signed, and inscribed in graphite, lower left: The Sphynx. | Etched by- W Holman Hunt / To Charles Symonds Esq with the Artists Comp.
title: The Desolation of Egypt
